Subject: Major Incident Update : www.faces.ae Website Restoring Across Networks
--------------------------------------------------






ÓÑÅ
 

Major Incident Update : www.faces.ae <http://www.faces.ae>  Website Restoring Across Networks

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 08 Feb, 25

Time: 11:00 AM GST

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

The www.faces.ae <http://www.faces.ae>  website is now coming back online across various network providers. Some users may still experience intermittent access as the changes take effect.

All other services, including the mobile app and other Faces sites, remain fully operational.
 
If you require any further assistance, please raise a support ticket via the following link: OneReach Support Portal <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> . 
Alternatively, you can contact us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or use the chatbot available on the support portal.
 
Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
